# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **Location:** New York, NY  
**LinkedIn:** [linkedin.com/in/darwhin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  |  **GitHub:** [github.com/dw8888](https://github.com/dw8888)  

---

## Professional Summary
Solutions-focused technologist with a robust background in software engineering and data analysis, specializing in Python, SQL, and cloud technologies. Proven ability to develop, design, and optimize software applications, ensuring high-quality code and efficient performance. Experienced in building scalable solutions and automating processes, contributing to enhanced application throughput and user satisfaction. Eager to leverage my skills at Meta to drive innovation in immersive social technologies.

---

City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  
Jun 2024  
GPA: 3.78, Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society

## Core Skills
- **Programming Languages:** Python, SQL, Java, C++, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS  
- **Cloud Technologies:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS), Azure (App Service, Functions)  
- **Data Management:** ETL/ELT, Data Modeling, Relational Databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle)  
- **Software Development:** Agile/Scrum, SDLC, CI/CD, Microservices Architecture  
- **Security:** SIEM, Active Directory, Cybersecurity best practices  
- **Tools:** Docker, Git, FastAPI, Postman, Swagger

New York, NY
